## Chapter 1


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──

✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ tibble    3.2.1

```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
data <- read.csv2("../data//badania.csv", sep=",")

badania <- data |> 
  mutate(
    sysBP = as.numeric(sysBP),
    diaBP = as.numeric(diaBP),
    BMI = as.numeric(BMI),
    sex = as.factor(male),
    education = as.factor(education),
    currentSmoker = as.factor(currentSmoker),
    BPMeds = as.factor(BPMeds),
    prevalentStroke = as.factor(prevalentStroke),
    prevalentHyp = as.factor(prevalentHyp),
    diabetes = as.factor(diabetes),
    TenYearCHD = as.factor(TenYearCHD)
  ) |> select(-male)
```
:::


### Age

p

p2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggthemes)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggplot2)

par(mfrow = c(1, 2))
badania |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = age, color = 'lightblue')) +
  geom_boxplot(lwd=2) +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](test_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("plot1_boxplot.png", width=9, height = 3)
badania |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=age, color="lightblue")) +
  geom_density(lwd=2)+
  theme_ipsum()
```
